data.title: Bad Rabbits And Kingsley Flood Take Top Prizes At Boston Music Awards
data.meta_description: The winners of the 26th annual Boston Music Awards were announced last night.
data.text:
Bad Rabbits was named artist of the year and Kingsley Flood won the prize for album of the year at the 26th annual Boston Music Awards held at the Liberty Hotel in Boston last night. The awards honor artists with “strong ties to New England.” Below is the full list of winners (in bold) and nominees.

Artist of the Year

Bad Rabbits, Dropkick Murphys, Karmin, Aoife O'Donovan, Amanda Palmer

Album/EP of the Year

Bad Rabbits – "American Love," Bearstonaut – "Paradice," My Dick – "My Dick's Double Full Length Release," Kingsley Flood – "Battles," Pretty and Nice – "Golden Rules for Golden People"

Song Of The Year

Bad Rabbits – "We Can Roll," Bearstronaut – "Passenger Side," Della Mae – "This World Oft Can Be," The Field Effect – “Ogunquit ME,” Viva Viva – “Dead In Yr Tracks”

New Artist Of The Year

New Highway Hymnal , Potty Mouth , Ruby Rose Fox, Speedy Ortiz , Thunderbloods

Live Artist Of The Year

Aerosmith, Bad Rabbits, Dropkick Murphys, Eddie Japan, Peter Wolf

Rock Artist Of The Year

Aerosmith, Deer Tick , Mean Creek , Mellow Bravo, Skaters

Hip Hop Artist Of The Year

Dutch Rebelle,, Grey Sky Appeal, Moe Pope & Rain, REKS, Slaine

Pop /R&B Artist Of The Year

Bad Rabbits , Louie Bello, Gentlemen Hall, Karmin, Young London

Americana Artist Of The Year

Girls Guns And Glory, Coyote Kolb, Christian McNeill & Sea Monsters, Session Americana, Tigerman WOAH!

Blues Artist Of The Year

Barrett Anderson, Gracie Curran & The High Falutin’ Band, James Montgomery, Peter Parcek, Roomful Of Blues

DJ Artist Of The Year

Brek One, DJ Paul, Foley, Knife, Leah V, Frank White

Electronic Artist Of The Year

Bearstronaut, Case & Point, Casey Desmond, Lifestyle , Andre Obin

Folk Artist Of The Year

David Wax Museum, Aofie O’Donovan, Ellis Paul , Vikesh Kapoor, You Won't

Gospel/Inspirational Artist Of The Year

David Altenor, Berklee Reverence Gospel Choir, Dream, Kendall Ramseur , Rashad McPherson & Divine Purpose

International Artist Of The Year

Debo Band, Evolfo Doofeht , Los Rumberos de Boston, Shun Ng, Women Of The World

Jazz Artist Of The Year

Elan Trotman, Grace Kelly , Lake Street Dive , Moira Lo Bianca, Omar Thomas

Metal/Hardcore Artist Of The Year

Converge, Doomriders , Gozu, Lunglust, Phantom Glue

Punk Artist Of The Year

Big D and the Kids Table, Dropkick Murphys, Mighty Mighty Bosstones, Street Dogs , Young Adults

Singer Songwriter Of The Year

David Champagne, Will Dailey, Mike Gent, Lori McKenna , Jimmy Ryan

Female Vocalist Of The Year

Amy Renee Heidemann, Ruby Rose Fox, Rachel Price, Shea Rose, Esperenza Spalding

Male Vocalist Of The Year

Will Dailey, Ward Hayden, John Powhida, Allan Sheinfeld, Barrence Whitfield

Producer Of The Year

Kurt Ballou, Brian Charles , Benny Grotto, Statik Selektah, Clinton Sparks

Video Of The Year

Louie Bello – "Shotgun," Karmin – "Acapella," Kingsley Flood – "Sigh A While," Mean Creek – "Cool Town," Parlour Bells – "Bachelor Hours"

Best Boston Artist Who Doesn't Live In Boston

Eli Paperboy Reed , Family Of The Year , Hooray For Earth, Lady Lamb The Beekeeper , Skaters

Best Dance Night

Fresh Produce, Heroes, Pico Picante, The Pill, Soul-Le-Lu-Jah

Best Live Music Venue

Atwoods , Brighton Music Hall, The Sinclair, The Middle East , T.T. The Bears Place

Best Live Ongoing Residency

Dennis Brennan Band At Lizard Lounge , Tim Gearan Band At Atwoods , Primordial Sounds At Middlesex, Session Americana At Lizard Lounge, Roy Sludge At Radio
